channel.title: Lecture 1 Introduction to Serverless ML and Databases on Social / Business Data Science 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture 1 Introduction to Serverless ML and Databases on Social / Business Data Science 2024

item.description: MLOps Lecture 1 - Intro to APIs & DataBases This repository contains lecutre slides, python scripts and dataset for the first lecture. API api_jokes.py is an example of simple public API api_finance.py, api_news.py are examples of private API using API_key (You need to register to get your private key) api_datasets.py is an example of API Wrapper EXTRA: joke_app.py is a simple streamlit app that uses IPA to print jokes EXTRA: api_weather.
